entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:20 PM ADT Thursday 13 April 2023
